revised_title: On the Mechanics of Animal Muscles and the Most Perfect Form of a Plane Quadrilateral Muscle
tldr: The author discusses the principles of animal mechanics, specifically focusing on the most perfect form of a plane quadrilateral muscle connecting two bones. He presents a test using the pectineus muscle of various animals to determine the conditions necessary for maximum work done by muscle contractions.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Anatomy and Physiology
